title: Wikipedia Co-Founder Jimmy Wales Was Educated in a One-Room Schoolhouse
sub_head: He became fascinated with encyclopedias after his mother bought one from a door-to-door salesman
body:
Jimmy Wales, 55, is an internet entrepreneur and co-founder of Wikipedia, the nonprofit online encyclopedia launched in 2001 that relies on user donations. He also is founder of Fandom, a for-profit web-hosting company. He spoke with Marc Myers.
Back in the days when you bought things from strangers at your front door, my mother invested in a childrenâ€™s World Book Encyclopedia. I was 3.
